metadata.description: Waypoints for scenic routes - used to generate road-accurate geometries via OSRM

routes.name: High Atlas Mountains
routes.notes: Marrakech to Merzouga, Tizi n'Tichka pass, kasbahs, Sahara edge

routes.name: Namib Desert Loop
routes.notes: Sossusvlei dunes, Skeleton Coast, Deadvlei, dramatic desert

routes.notes: Dragon Mountains, San rock art, Amphitheatre, spectacular hiking

routes.name: Panorama Route / Blyde River Canyon
routes.notes: Third largest canyon on Earth, Three Rondavels, God's Window
